# contents

**Instance Property**

An object that provides the contents of the layer. Animatable.

## Declaration

```swift
var contents: Any? { get set }
```

## Discussion

A layer can set this property to a [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreGraphics/CGImage] to display the image as its contents.

The default value of this property is `nil`.

## Providing Emitter Cell Content

- **contentsRect**: A rectangle (in the unit coordinate space) that specifies the portion of [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CAEmitterCell/contents] that the receiver should draw. Animatable.
- **emitterCells**: An optional array containing the sub-cells of this cell.
